searchDocs.title: Atlas:Import​
searchDocs.content: This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields Instance Related </> Atlas:Atlas:Import( ModuleName: String-- The module you wish to require. ) → Module-- Returns the required module. A neater and slower verison of require, taking a string. And then looks up in the modules table, remember if you wish to require this way the target module must have the "Atlas_Module" Tag.

searchDocs.title: Atlas:RecursiveImport​
searchDocs.content: This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields Instance Related </> Atlas:Atlas:RecursiveImport( ModuleName: String,-- The module you wish to require. InstanceToSearch: Instance -- The Instance that the target module is parented too. ) → Module-- Returns the required module. Allows you to require modules parented to instances that do not have the Atlas_Module tag.

searchDocs.title: Atlas:GetObject​
searchDocs.content: This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields Instance Related </> Atlas:Atlas:GetObject( ObjectName: String-- The instance you wish to find. ) → Instance -- Returns the target instance. Allows you to get any object that has the Atlas_Object tag.
